body.p: Dr Sir enclosed please find petition for the benefit of Mrs M. J. Young and in calling your attention it would breefly state that at the time the fine was obtained against her E. S. Craig Esqr was Prosecuting attorney and that it never was his intention to prosecute the its collection, he knowing Mrs Ys inability to pay it. since the election of the present Commonwealths attorney he has revised the judgement is about to try to enforce its collection. Mr Dupee knows nothing about Mrs Y's totally inability to pay E. S. Craig Esqr I understand will address you a letter in the behalf of Mrs Y. your kind interposition in the behalf of the widow will greatly oblige your petitioners.

Respectfully your
Obt Servt
U. C. Sherrill

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Mrs M. J. Young
Refused
Remit except fees & cost
Tho E Bramlette
$60
Tipling
18th May/64
